ActFinancial Administration Act
PrecisAmendment to the CORPORATE PLAN of the BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT BANK OF CANADA for the 2007-08 to 2011-12 planning period to allow the Business Development Bank of Canada to borrow short-term funds from the Consolidated Revenue Fund.
